item.title: Apps I'm Taking into 2019
item.description: I should probably start off with a bit of a caveat. Okay. Now that we have that out of the way, here are a few of the apps that I’ve discovered over the last 365 days that I’ll be taking with me into 2019. PyCharm PyCharm is a Python IDE with an extensive collection of plugins. I’m using the community edition to develop Python scripts in support the Consortium of Ohio Libraries, mainly to interact with the Evergreen ILS.

item.title: Ohio Digital Network Launches
item.description: Participating in the early group for the technical infrastructure for this project - simply called ‘DPLA Ohio’ at the time - shaped the trajectory of my career firmly towards technology. Check out the State Library of Ohio’s announcement. And the, visit the Ohio Digital Network!
